name: Rennan Cockles
title: Software Engineer | Machine Learning Engineer | Python Specialist
summary:
Brazilian Software Engineer and Machine Learning Engineer with over 10 years of experience across national and multinational companies. 
Holding a Bachelor's in Computer Engineering and a Post-Graduation in Analytics, I excel in developing data-driven solutions and optimizing processes using cutting-edge technologies.

education.title: Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering
education.institution: State University of Rio de Janeiro, UERJ

education.title: Post-Graduation in Analytics and Business Intelligence

work_experience.title: Machine Learning Engineer
work_experience.description: Led the development and implementation of machine learning platforms for a global credit report company, optimizing analytics and automation for clients in over 100 countries. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative AI solutions.

work_experience.title: Data Engineering Specialist
work_experience.description: As the technical leader of the Innovation team, spearheaded data-driven initiatives using AI to enhance competitiveness. Architected AWS solutions and guided teams in developing machine learning technology.

work_experience.title: Senior Data Scientist
work_experience.description: Developed strategic pricing tools in collaboration with business teams, enhancing decision-making processes and pricing strategies through advanced analytics.

work_experience.title: Machine Learning Engineer & Software Engineer
work_experience.description: Led machine learning projects from inception to deployment, developing Python APIs and configuring server environments for robust applications. Engaged with business teams to deliver software solutions using SCRUM and Kanban methodologies, enhancing operational efficiencies and application deployments.
